website_summaries.verdict: A kegerator that preserves beer up to one week without going flat.
pros: Strong reviews for this kegerator's ability to produce craft-quality beer that satisfies  versatile tastes
Small in size yet sharp and sturdy in stature
cons: Note the size may not exactly be 64 ounces

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and all the parts as advertised. I tested it out using a couple of cans of (relatively) cheap beer to make sure everything seals correctly and to figure out the regulator settings before trying it out on a full growler fill. Works great! Keeps the beer fresh for at least a week and probably a lot longer, but at 64oz, you'll polish off the beer before it goes flat. Gets a lot of compliments and inquisitive looks where ever I take it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: DY

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: leaked, lost lots of beer and two capsules. contacted seller who never replied. returned for refund
customer_reviews.author: PtL

customer_reviews.title: Great Growler system
customer_reviews.text: This growler looks like a little beer keg. It fits perfectly in the bottom of my mini fridge in the outside kitchen on my trailer. All thin wall stainless. Very light. I bought a second keg ($29.00), so I could enjoy one, while the other ready for filling. It doesn't come with the government warnings, so you need to get a sticker (Amazon sells them: (Medium 3 Pack) Alcohol / Beer / Wine - Government Warning Label for Growlers - Vinyl Self Adhesive Labels), or some places won't fill it. I added a small bungie cord to keep the tap closed, so that if I hit a bump in the road, all my beer won't pour out.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bumala

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use
customer_reviews.text: After filling it for the first time, I was able to get out one pint then nothing after that. Looks nice, keg is fine, but the valve is a waste of money....doesn't work after even the first use
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kubisch

customer_reviews.title: Great value and solid
customer_reviews.text: This unit fits nicely in my refrigerator and keeps the beer carbonated down to the last drop. When you use this try to fill the container as much as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R Adams

customer_reviews.title: First time using this vendor and I trust all it’s products are solid
customer_reviews.text: Its very unique and manageable It’s a conversation item and it service as a surprise birthday item😊 However I’m missing a important item that was not enclosed which is CO2 capsule attachment ..therefore would appreciate a rush shipment to complete and awesome product ..thanking you in advance
customer_reviews.author: Sally Ann Agustin

customer_reviews.title: Fresh beer
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to use. Have used for beer and kombucha.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy H

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love craft beer and like that I can take it home and not have to drink it all in one night to keep it from going flat. Love the system!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Fits my other growler. Fits in my fridge. Freshness lasts till you finish the last drop.
customer_reviews.author: Dogwood

customer_reviews.title: Box was opened and seemed like a return
customer_reviews.text: Recived product a day late. Box was opened and seemed like a return. Cap for travel keg had mold growing on and around packaging. Opened up mini keg and was full of water and mildew.
customer_reviews.author: Wina

customer_reviews.title: No. Bad customer service and cheesy product
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with the customer service from the HaveGet team and Coffey person/office. It doesn’t come with a travel lid so you’d have to take the whole rig to get a fill. That seems silly. When I emailed they directed me to buy one (mentioned a code for 90% off which never came), which is really cheesy. Ended up just returning it. Should have just spent the money for the ManCan to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Anita

customer_reviews.title: This thing is just AWESOME - it does come with a cap for easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is just AWESOME - it does come with a cap for easy transporting to and from. The actual hardware for the valve is quite heavy - its impressive and it WORKS - I've used it with a bunch of different beer at home, even when not finishing up a beer fully I can rescue it and save for the next day - works as advertised - I was pleasantly surprised after reading other reviews - Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sandro Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a birthday gift for my husband, but when it got here the box was smashed and had a hole in it. Then we open the torn up box and the pressurizer piece was broken. Would have been an awesome gift if it wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: Lynzie1105

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but leaks a lot
customer_reviews.text: Product leaks a lot. It’s convenient and the CO2 cartridges are cheap but when you spend time cleaning after pouring and can’t put it back in the fridge because it leaks all over if anything touches th CO2 cartridge it’s not worth it. After I poured a pint I depressurized and it still leaked. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: ChadT

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty cool! I would definitely get the one gallon tank also. The only downside is the CO2 cartridge cost , also you have to be quick screwing them on. The first one pretty much leaked out before I got it tight.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It will look great in our man ...
customer_reviews.text: I won this from an Amazon contest. Love it! It will look great in our man cave
customer_reviews.author: Janet Sanchez

product_meta.title: Lamtor 64 Ounce Mini Keg Pressurized Growler for Craft Dispenser System CO2 Adjustable Draft Beer Faucet with Perfect Pour Regulator, 2L, Silver
product_meta.description: Will Keep your beverage Colder Longer than it's glass competitors and breakage is never a concern. - Durable stainless steel construction-it can be used in both outdoors and indoors. - also ideal for fermenting, kegging, storing, and dispensing kombucha or cold brew Coffee. - a stainless steel, Threaded, no-leak cap keeps fresh beer on the inside and beer-flattening air on the outside. mini kegs are a fantastic way to store and dispense beer. they turn your fridge into a bar, dispensing fresh beer whenever your glass is empty. they're easy to care for, quick to chill and protect the beer from light and oxygen. The dispensing tap lets you easily serve your beer at home or at parties. This makes the A great way to share your own home brew or local favorites. so if you've got a party, event or dinner coming up, get the Mini kegs in! the perfect pour regulator system is an awesome piece of engineering that regulates the flow of your beverage. It keeps the bad air out, The carbonation in, and never gives you a glass full of foam. And that's the way it should be. Package including keg beer*1 Product manual (CO2 capsule not included)
feature_bullets: Capacity: 2L size: 5.1 x 5.1 x 7.8 Light and small easy to carry. Perfect for any adventures. Beautiful design for easy storage and never be broken.

Indestructible: made in food grade 304 stainless steel is more durable, he same steel used in kegs, which preserves the flavors, aromas, and unique characteristics of your beer. Will keep beer vacuum pressured and Fresh.

BEER LOVERS : The beer keg is a perfect gift for any homebrew or craft draught beer kegging equipment enthusiast! A traditional growler not only easy to break and let beer go flat after the first pour, Have Get mini keg growler perfectly solve these problems. Suitable Gift for your daddy/father.

CO2 CARTRIDGES : Each 12gCO2 cartridges(thread 3/8) can supply 128 oz. of wine. Keep the beer’s carbonated. And keeps beer fresh until the last drop. Even when opened. Easy to Clean - Easy to Fill - It is really portable for camping.
PACKAGE INCLUDED：Mini Keg *1 Product Manual*1 (CO2 Capsule Not Included). If you have any question, please contact us.
